product_name: Core Concepts Toaster Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Core Concepts Toaster Jacket is a full-featured jacket for wintertime play with a waterproof, breathable laminate that supplies weather protection and ample breathability. Waterproof and breathable 2-layer laminate provides weather protection in all conditions. Polyester shell features 100% fully taped seams for the ultimate seal against snow and water. Jacket features Toaster Technology(TM), a silver-colored lining that retains body heat for warmth without bulky insulation. Cuffs have rip-and-stick closures and adjustable interior stretch cuffs to keep snow out; single-pull hem drawcord seals out cold while trapping in warmth. Zip-out powder skirt blocks the spindrift and cold air. Zippered underarm vents allow on-the-fly temperature regulation. The Core Concepts Toaster Jacket has a helmet-compatible hood with a brim to aid visibility in poor conditions and a drawcord for adjustability. Storage includes an internal mesh pocket for goggles (with attached goggle cleaning cloth) and a zip pocket for ID, credit cards and mp3 player (with headphone cord exit port). Warm your hands and store often-used items in the external double entry hand pockets and 2 chest pockets. Closeout.
